form.IN:
Obliko
have
pogosto skrajšamo v
‘ve
,
has
v
‘s
,
had
pa v
‘d.

sense.def:
Izraz
have
uporabljamo kot pomožni glagol pri tvorjenju časa, ki se imenuje
present perfect tense
.

seg.quote: We have already done that.
I've never heard of it.
It hasn't rained for a month.

sense.def:
Izraz
had
uporabljamo kot pomožni glagol pri tvorjenju preteklega časa, ki se imenuje
past perfect tense
.

seg.quote: Officials said that the two men had at last signed an agreement.
I had just finished when you arrived.

sense.def:
Obliko
having
uporabljamo na začetku odvisnega stavka, v katerem je omenjeno dejanje, ki se je zgodilo pred začetkom drugega opisanega dejanja.

seg.quote: Quite a few of the shop fronts were still boarded up, having closed down in 1930 or 1931.
We were back in Edinburgh at ten past twelve having driven straight across the bridge again.

sense.def:
Za izrazom
have
lahko uporabimo nedoločnik s
to
, kadar hočemo povedati, da nekaj mora biti storjeno ali se mora zgoditi. V tem pomenu uporabljamo tudi izraz
have got
: glej
got
.

seg.quote: Then he had to sit down because he felt dizzy.
I have to speak to your father.
There are plenty of jobs; she doesn't have to go to Canada.

sense.def:
Have
lahko uporabljamo s samostalniki, ki opisujejo dejanja, kadar hočemo poudariti, da ima neko dejanje jasen začetek ali konec, ali kadar želimo o dejanju dati več podatkov.

seg.quote: You go and have a look.
I had a little stroll round the garden this morning.
We're having a meeting. Come and join in.
I had a lot of comments on my work.

sense.def:
V vsakdanjem govoru ali pisanju pogosto uporabljamo izraz
have
tam, kjer bi v uradnejšem jeziku uporabili natančnejši glagol. Na primer, navadno rečemo:
I have a sandwich every lunchtime
namesto
I eat a sandwich every lunchtime
.

seg.quote: I had a boring afternoon.
They all had an injection when they left Britain.
Boylan had his back to the window.

sense.def:
Have
pogosto uporabljamo v strukturah, kjer bi bil pomen enak, če bi uporabili glagol
be
, ker govorimo o oznakah ali značilnostih nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: He had beautiful manners.
It's nice to have an excuse.
...machines which have dangerous moving parts.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
have
lahko povemo, da imamo nekaj v lasti, ali pa govorimo o predmetih in osebah, ki so povezani z nami. V takem pomenu uporabljamo tudi izraz
have got
: glej
got
.

seg.quote: What's the point in having a mink coat?
He had a small hotel.
They don't have any money.
I have lots of friends.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
PAST PARTICIPLE

sense.def:
Have
uporabljamo pred preteklim deležnikom, kadar želimo povedati, da smo poskrbeli, da se bo nekaj zgodilo, ali kadar rečemo, da se nam nekaj dogaja, ne da bi kaj ukrenili.

seg.quote: You should have your car cleaned.
Isn't it time you had your hair cut?
She had her purse stolen.
Children love to have stories read to them.

sense.def:
Izraz
have
uporabljamo s predmetom in nedoločnikom s
to
, kadar hočemo povedati, da smo za nekaj odgovorni.

seg.quote: She had a huge department to administer.
I've never had so much work to finish.

sense.def:
To have it in for someone
pomeni skleniti, da bomo nekomu otežili življenje, ker ga ne maramo ali smo jezni nanj.

cit.quote: zameriti komu, nekomu želeti nekaj slabega

seg.quote: He had it in for me.

sense.def:
To have been had
pomeni, da nas je nekdo namenoma ogoljufal, na primer tako, da nam je nekaj prodal za previsoko ceno.

Kadar nekdo
has had it
, bo imel težave zaradi nečesa, kar je storil.

Izraz
I have had it
pomeni, da smo preveč izčrpani, da bi nadaljevali tisto, kar počnemo.

cit.quote: ne morem več, dovolj imam tega

seg.quote: They both look as if they've about had it.

sense.def:
To be had up for something
pomeni priti pred sodišče zaradi zločina, ki smo ga zagrešili.

seg.quote: He was had up for indecent exposure.

sense.def:
To be having someone on
pomeni nekoga dražiti;
